name: Hide URL Bar Zoom Reset Button
description: Firefox 51 added a zoom reset button in the URL bar with no option of hiding it. Users who use Ctrl/âŒ˜+= to reset zoom levels may wish to disable it.
additional_info: ***** PLEASE READ ***** NOTE: Mozilla WebExtensions do not allow the customization of the Firefox user interface, so you'll notice the zoom indicator reappearing once you update Stylus / Stylish to a non-legacy version. FIX: You'll need to manually create a chrome/userChrome.css file in your Firefox profile directory. Create the 'chrome' folder if you don't have it. Paste the CSS in this script into that file, save, and restart your browser.
